```{r}
# 1. 定义 KL 距离函数
kl_dist <- function(p, q) {
  p <- p + 1e-10
  q <- q + 1e-10
  sum(p * log(p / q))
}

# 2. 构建 KL 距离矩阵
n <- nrow(profile_matrix)
kl_matrix <- matrix(0, n, n)
rownames(kl_matrix) <- rownames(profile_matrix)
colnames(kl_matrix) <- rownames(profile_matrix)

for (i in 1:n) {
  for (j in 1:n) {
    kl_matrix[i, j] <- kl_dist(profile_matrix[i, ], profile_matrix[j, ])
  }
}

# 3. 构建聚类树
hc <- hclust(as.dist(kl_matrix), method = "complete")

# 4. 提取 C60 和 MEOW 名称与索引
labels <- rownames(profile_matrix)
is_meow <- grepl("^MEOW60\\.", labels)
is_c60 <- grepl("^C60\\.", labels)

meow_names <- labels[is_meow]
c60_names <- labels[is_c60]

meow_ids <- sub("MEOW60\\.(\\d+) \\(.*\\)", "MEOW\\1", meow_names)
c60_ids <- sub("C60\\.(\\d+) \\(.*\\)", "C\\1", c60_names)

meow_weights <- as.numeric(sub(".*\\((.*)\\)", "\\1", meow_names))
names(meow_weights) <- meow_ids

# 5. 创建一个空结果列表
result_list <- list()

# 6. 遍历每个 MEOW 节点，找出树上与其聚成一簇的最靠近的 C60 节点
library(dendextend)

dend <- as.dendrogram(hc)

for (i in seq_along(meow_names)) {
  meow_label <- meow_names[i]
  meow_id <- meow_ids[i]
  meow_weight <- meow_weights[meow_id]

  # 找出该节点在树中的路径
  node_path <- which(labels == meow_label)

  # 找到同簇中的成员（cutree默认为k=2或更多也可调）
  cluster_membership <- cutree(hc, h = hc$height[which(hc$labels == meow_label)])

  group_members <- labels[cluster_membership == cluster_membership[meow_label]]

  c60_in_group <- group_members[grepl("^C60", group_members)]

  # 如果多个C60在同一簇，选一个与MEOW距离最小的
  if (length(c60_in_group) > 0) {
    c60_ids_clean <- sub("C60\\.(\\d+) \\(.*\\)", "C\\1", c60_in_group)
    dists <- sapply(c60_in_group, function(c60) kl_matrix[meow_label, c60])
    closest_c60 <- c60_ids_clean[which.min(dists)]
    min_dist <- min(dists)
  } else {
    closest_c60 <- NA
    min_dist <- NA
  }

  result_list[[i]] <- data.frame(
    MEOW = meow_id,
    C60 = closest_c60,
    Distance = min_dist,
    Weight = meow_weight
  )
}

# 7. 合并并输出结果表格
result_df <- do.call(rbind, result_list)

# 8. 显示或保存
print(result_df)
# write.csv(result_df, "MEOW_C60_nearest.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
